item.title: Find Median From Data Stream
item.description: The link to problem is Leetcode/find-median-from-data-stream This is hard problem but it is somewhat easy compared to some other hard problems. It is only easy if you know data-structures well enough. In this problem you are asked to create class which has two methods one for adding a integer, other function is used to get median in the ordered list made up of elements added previously in the list. Heapqueue Approach Now this problem is hard cause we have to get median in O(1) constant complexity.
